data.title: Scottish Fuels in Stirlingshire, FK5
data.meta_description: Does Scottish Fuels in Stirlingshire, FK5 supply red diesel near you? Get contact details, opening times & more. Search for more red diesel suppliers
data.text:
Here at Red Diesel Near Me, we help many thousands of red diesel fuel customers every month to find a local red diesel fuel suppliers for their homes and businesses.

Scottish Fuels is a red diesel fuel supplier that supplies their range of fuels which includes red diesel to customers from their fuel depot based in Stirlingshire.

The vast majority of red diesel suppliers can supply red diesel in barrels, as well as in oil tankers with quantities ranging from 500 litres up to as much as 36,000 litres*.

Red diesel, also known as gas oil is a low fuel duty variant of white diesel, also known as road diesel which the majority of diesel vehicle owners fill up with from petrol stations across the UK.

It can only legally be used off road, so any reputable red diesel fuel supplier such as Scottish Fuels will look to ensure that you are aware of this before supplying this fuel to you.

Users of red diesel include farming and agricultural customers, construction industry customers and those using it for burning in oil burning boilers to name but a few.

*Please check with Scottish Fuels for the actual quantities of red diesel they are able to supply.
